text:
#Lockdown2035 unless we comprehend to live with #covid19 like the #flu virus, #vaccine won’t cure covid - there’s no #SilverBullet❗️
Meanwhile the #British economy getting demolished & we’ll have a generation without education - a recipe for disaster‼️
